#BlackMagicCraft #Episode087

In collaboration with this video's sponsor (www.dicebard.com) I built a cool dice tower which I will give away to one lucky viewer. The goal here is to raise as much money as possible for the fantastic St. Jude Children's research hospital.

There are a few ways you can help the cause and enter to win this dicetower.

Go to www.dicebard.com for details. 
https://dicebard.com/uncategorized/dice-bard-st-jude-giveaway-details/

You can make a direct donation to be entered to win: 
https://dicebard.com/product/st-jude-donation/

OR you can enter and donate by downloading the dice tower template I created to build this project. Each $5 donated this way gives you one entry into the contest (up to 20 entries):
https://dicebard.com/product/black-magic-craft-dice-tower-supporting-st-jude/

Of course if you just want to pick up some dice or accessories for your game don't forget to use the promo code "blackmagiccraft" at www.dicebard.com to receive FREE expedited shipping worldwide on your entire order. 

Contest ends May 31st. I will announce the video here on the channel. 




‚û≥  http://www.blackmagiccraft.ca

‚û≥ Facebook: https://goo.gl/hvNgQL

‚û≥ Join the Tabletop Crafters Guild: https://goo.gl/RMMqoh
